text: Sirnach railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Sirnach, in the Swiss canton of Thurgau. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge St. Gallen–Winterthur line of Swiss Federal Railways. == Services == The following services stop at Sirnach: * Zürich S-Bahn: /: half- hourly service between and ; the S12 continues from Winterthur to . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Thurgau Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Sirnach railway station
